description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored "Align the Misaligned," "Continental Drift," "Economy of Garbage," and curated the course "Align the Misaligned."
blurb: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with cognitive science background and career in high-impact roles. Blends creativity and analytical skills, known for innovation, project leadership, user-centered design. Authored influential articles and curated courses.
